reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size and appreciate its elegant design, with one noting the pretty broche-type pin at the waist. Moreover, the dress is well-made, comfortable, and flattering for various body types, with one customer mentioning how it minimizes curves. Additionally, they like the color options and appreciate the pockets, with one noting they are deep enough to hold items. However, the fabric weight receives mixed feedback, with some finding it lightweight while others describe it as heavy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress..Nice Fit
items.body: Beautiful dress! Dress is well made. Nice material (heavy enough to wear in fall weather). The length was perfect for me. I'm 5'5. I ordered a size XL. I generally wear size 14/16. Will be ordering another color. I did have to adjust the decorative brooch that came with the dress. Read more
items.author: T. Hill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress found!!!
items.body: Fit perfectly and style was flattering to my shape. Fabric is thick yet stretchy, can handle the elements and movement, and not see-thru. I received many compliments on dress look and color (I ordered the yellow). Used it for my brother’s coastal wedding and was best choice!! It looked better than a dress from Nordstrom that was 3x the price! So comfortable- was able to sit, dance and move easily in it. I want one in a few more colors!! Read more
items.author: NotErn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars This dress is devine.
items.body: This dress is gorgeous and true to colour. It comes with two pockets that are deep enough to hold things not just for show. The dress looked very chic good value. The issues I had was the dress was heavy and the fabric made me very hot. Would not recommend wearing in summer or in tropics if you will not be in air conditioning. The fabric clung in all the right places. Read more
items.author: book worm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant but comfy!
items.body: This dress is so comfortable and elegant but has pockets!! Lucky for me I have two weddings I can wear this at. Great Quality, fits to size, it flows gracefully because the fabric is light feeling. Read more
items.author: Louis & Melissa Herzner

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Material quality is good. Has pockets, which is nice.
items.body: The dress is nice. I like the fit and the style. Not to sure about the top, it has a slanted bodice, which I didn’t notice in the picture and comes a little low and shows my underclothing. Also, the jewel on the front is cheap looking and is green, not blue to match the dress. Haven’t decided if I will keep. I will likely return. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: This dress is worth every penny. I loved the color and the fit was perfect, true to size. I wore it for a southern style wedding in October. When I washed it, it came out perfect. Read more
items.author: CH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful semi formal dress!
items.body: The fit was perfect. The material was medium weight. It is a beautiful dress that just hangs and flows beautifully. I wore it to my granddaughter’s fall wedding. My sister borrowed it for a Christmas event because she liked it so much! I would buy again! Olive green color! Read more
items.author: Pat

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good for the price!
items.body: I needed a last-minute short-sleeve dress for a wedding this coming weekend since the weather's going to be much warmer than usual so I bought this one in "coffee." First, the color: colors aren't always easy when buying online so know that this shade looks more like "coffee with cream." It's brown but it's a light brown. The fabric is kind of heavy. Personally, I really like the weight but if you want something light and breathable, you won't like this. The fabric itself looks like crêpe and it has a little stretch to it, too. It has a zipper but I didn't need it. Also, be aware that the neckline is intentionally asymetrical. The flutter sleeves are nice and roomy and the skirt part has great twirl factor!. Oh. And. IT HAS POCKETS!! They're not *deep deep* but they're totally deep enough for me to shove my hands into. A habit. #sorrynotsorry The gemstone thing is just a brooch and it easily comes off if you don't like it. I'm a little busty and, if you are too, know that it hangs weirdly on the dress. It makes the brooch look like it's hanging off your boob. If you're an A or B cup, though, you'll be fine! I'll definitely use the brooch on something else but this dress looks great without it. I normally wear size L but I bought this dress in a size XL. I'm so glad I did - XL was perfect. For context, I'm 5'5" and weigh 158 lbs - normally a size US 14 or a snug size 12. Read more
items.author: Chicago Kelley

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Evening Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Evening Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Purple, Yellow, Burgundy, Peacock Blue, Royal Blue, Army Green, Black, Bright Red, Coffee, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
